query.sql: select IFNULL(id,'') ID, IFNULL(name,'') NAME from menu where category = %s and del_yn = 'N' order by sort_seq desc

select distinct a.seq, IFNULL(a.id,'') ID,IFNULL(a.subject,'') SUBJECT, IFNULL(a.o_subject,'') O_SUBJECT,IFNULL(a.memo,'') MEMO, IFNULL(a.memo1,'') MEMO1, IFNULL(a.img,'') IMG, IFNULL(a.etc,'') ETC, IFNULL(a.url,'') URL, IFNULL(a.daum_url,'') DURL, IFNULL(b.id,'') F_ID from content a LEFT OUTER JOIN favorites b ON a.seq = b.id where a.id = %s and a.id != '201200' order by a.seq asc

select distinct a.seq, IFNULL(b.sort,'') SORT, IFNULL(a.class,'') ID, IFNULL(a.subject,'') SUBJECT, IFNULL(a.o_subject,'') O_SUBJECT,IFNULL(b.etc,'') MEMO, IFNULL(a.memo1,'') MEMO1, IFNULL(a.img,'') IMG, IFNULL(a.etc,'') ETC, IFNULL(a.url,'') URL, IFNULL(a.daum_url,'') DURL, IFNULL(c.id,'') F_ID from content a LEFT OUTER JOIN favorites c ON a.seq = c.id, code b where a.popular = b.seq and a.class = %s and a.id != '201200' order by b.sort asc

select distinct a.seq, IFNULL(a.id,'') ID,IFNULL(a.subject,'') SUBJECT, IFNULL(a.o_subject,'') O_SUBJECT, IFNULL(a.memo,'') MEMO, IFNULL(a.memo1,'') MEMO1, IFNULL(a.img,'') IMG, IFNULL(a.etc,'') ETC, IFNULL(a.url,'') URL, IFNULL(a.daum_url,'') DURL, IFNULL(b.id,'') F_ID from content a LEFT OUTER JOIN favorites b ON a.seq = b.id where (a.id like '2%' or a.id like '3%' or a.id like '4%') and a.id != '201200' order by a.subject asc
